section.heading: Corporate powers.
section.text: The Trust Fund may exercise those powers conferred upon a nonprofit corporation pursuant to Chapters 1 and 4 of Title 29.

annotations.annotation: D.C. Law 18-378 substituted “Chapters 1 and 4 of Title 29” for “subchapter I of Chapter 3 of Title 29”.
For temporary addition of subchapter, see notes to § 4-1341.01.
